data.description: Implements an RTF reader as per RTF Spec 1.7
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will build on RTF::Tokenizer, which currently just
    provides a very low-level interface to RTF, to create a class that
    helps people create RTF readers. RTF::Parser sort of sits between
    the two, but has no documentation, and appears abandoned.
